attributes.additional_details:
Football is for working class people, a statement that is no longer true. With ticket prices going upwards of the £100 mark, it has to be stopped.

We are campaigning to have a cap on ticket prices of £20.00, which gives everyone a chance to support their club.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities, although the Government is aware and is encouraging the FA and others to keep sight of this problem.
